Package kaleidoscope

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Ball
    Ball extends Shape.
    Controller
    The Controller sets up the GUI and handles all the controls (buttons, menu items, etc.)
    Model
    This is the Model class for a kaleidoscope.
    Polygon
    Polygon extends Shape and adds methods and instance variables that make it compatible with the drawing methods drawPolygon and fillPolygon.
    PolygonTest
    Provides a test for the methods Make and Get Facets specific to Polygon class.
    Rectangle
    Rectangle extends Shape.
    Shape
    The Shape abstract class provides instance variables and methods for determining movement, reflection positions, and setters/getters for instance variables, to be used by subclass shapes.
    ShapeTest
    Provides unit tests for the Shape class.
    View
    The View "observes" and displays what is going on in the Model.
